io.micronaut.tracing.brave.sender

Class HttpClientSenderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.brave.sender.HttpClientSenderFactory

  • @Factory
 @Requires(beans=BraveTracerConfiguration.HttpClientSenderConfiguration.class)
public class HttpClientSenderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
